infos.value: Well, well, well... Leonis Castle has fallen.
The queen, Helena, and the younger prince, Sterne, are both in hand.
The real message here is that Oelde and Mont have slipped out of our net, is it not?
Then perhaps I, too, should greet Leonis Castle with my presence?
You would go in person, Your Holiness?
Little birds have been telling rumors of Sterne for quite some time now.
I have long desired to have him under my control by any means necessary.
And lo! To realize that dream at so soon a juncture...
